ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Goodbye
ygData.msgSnippet: This group is fine. You want to see rough? Read my server message board, lol. Seriously, I like it here. People seem to be able to state their opinions just
ygData.messageBody:
This group is fine. You want to see rough? Read my server message board, lol.

Seriously, I like it here. People seem to be able to state their opinions just fine here. I never got the feeling that anyone was trying to tell TC that he/she should get a dino or horse, just that there were more benefits to having one than he/she seemed to realize.

And isn't that why we are part of mailing groups like this? To learn more about the game?

 mlockridge01 <MLockridge01@...> wrote:

Hey, some people have different needs, and are more sensative. I hope
TC can find someplace which meets those needs, and does it well.

As it is, I find this group generally quite fine. Then again, I have
worked in a jail for the past thirteen years. My skin is a bit thick.
As is my head, obviously, if I haven't found a better way to earn a
living than working in a jail.

Days off are good, though. Lots of gaming time.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Matthew Bond" <mattgbond@n...>
wrote:
> Thunder Cat wrote:
> > I am posting to tell Su that this is AGAIN my last post. I left
this
> > group once before because of idiotic members who insisted on
forcing
> > their opinions apon others, and I will not put up with it. I have
> > better things to do with my time then spend it with opinionated
low
> > lifes. Su, I'm sorry for everything, none of this goes to you, I
know
> > you tired, but there are just too many morons to filter out of the
> > group. To the rest of you, you will never get anywhere in life
with
> > the attitudes you have. Only in a fantasy game like EverQuest will
> > you ever be something. But at some point you need to grow up and
face
> > reality, and it's not going to be fun or easy when you do. Do not
> > bother replying to this post. Leave your fights and comments out
of
> > Su's group and for once in your life respect her wishes and be
> > CONSIDERATE. If you forgot what that word means, get a
dictionary. If
> > you MUST comment, e-mail me personally, but I most likely will
just
> > delete the message. Like I said, I have better things to do. Good
> > day. 
> >
> > -= Mippon - Level 40 Halfling Druid =-
>
> Does this guy read the same posts I do?
>
> <shrug>
>
> Bye, I guess.
>
> Matt
>
> Honig Wayfarer

> Cazic Thule
